review: I love the convenience of this.
author: Elvira

review: Works as advertised. Installation is fast and easy. With Prime everything is set for free viewing movies, TV series, Showtime Anytime, etc. I am going to purchase another one for a second TV in the house.
author: D. Wile

review: I love my fire stick! The apps that are free are awesome. I am very happy with the easy set up too!
author: Debbie Cluckey

review: So far, so good. It does everything I ask it to do.
author: John Lewis

review: I love it! we were using our old playstation to watch hulu netflix n amazon instant. Our fan was getting loud in the playstation it was dying on us and didnt really want to spend so much money on an apple tv so $40 very well spent! easy to use and install . We just love it !
author: Sylvia Truc Trinh

review: We love the fire stick. I'm also a prime member and there is a lot of free things to watch, and music is great.
author: Edie

review: Like it very much but Prime day was a cancer. I hope they are embarrassed. I even bought this that day for $24.95 only to find the order never went through. A rep and supervisor said too bad so sad. It did not matter so I bought it anyway. Buyers Beware!
author: Carol

review: Fire Stick is currently not compatible with my cable providor, Charter, which is kind of frustrating since they are a major provider, so I've really only been able to use it for Netflix. The home screen takes some getting used to, you seem to have to do a lot of button clicking to find your favorite apps. These should be more easily accessible, or at the top of your home screen. The free games are a nice touch. Since my cable provider is not listed, my 8 year old and I have spend a lot of time playing games. Overall, not a bad deal for the price.
author: Kiel Lewandowski
